dcterms:creator: Z. Liu
C. R. Opazo
D. Teney
S. Gould
dcterms:description: CIRR is the first released dataset of open-domain for the composed image retrieval task, consisting of real-life images with human-generated modification sentences. It contains 36,554 triplets, with 80% for training, 10% for validation, and 10% for evaluation.
dcterms:title: CIRR Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Wu
Y. Gao
X. Guo
Z. Al-Halah
S. Rennie
K. Grauman
R. Feris
dcterms:description: FashionIQ is a realistic dataset for interactive image retrieval in the fashion domain, where each query consists of one reference image and two natural language descriptions about the visual differences of the target image.
dcterms:title: FashionIQ Dataset
